Date: Monday, 9/9/1973
Subject: Progress of Craig Mitchell
Dear Sir,
Craig Mitchell has nothing more to prove at A Quad Cities Angels!
He has an ERA of 3.32 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
